structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Office of jailer consolidated with office of sheriff in county containing a consolidated local government, city of the first class, or an urban-county government.
law.text: The offices of sheriff and jailer in counties containing a consolidated local government, a city of the first class, or an urban-county government shall be consolidated, but the office of sheriff shall be retained; and the sheriff hereafter in such counties shall perform the duties of jailer.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 72, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 2, effective January 3, 1994. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 231, sec. 1.
